name: Pyradia
tag_list: web-converting, web-coating-equipment, gravure-coater, turret-winder, surface-winder, air-flotation-dryer, heat-treating-furnaces, quench-furnace, industrial-ovens, laboratory-furnace, aluminum-furnaces, aluminum-solution-heat-treating
overview:
Since 1973, Pyradia has been a major supplier of web converting equipment, industrial furnaces and dust colleting systems to a great number of top companies in the world. With our 35 000 square feet facility, Pyradia can provide you with many types of equipment, specificaly designed to meet your requirements. Our core business advantage resides in our highly experienced engineering department, our 5-star turnkey service and our legendary product reliability.

From the first proposal to final commissionning, all the tasks are performed in conformity with the ISO 9001:2000 standard. All Pyradia’ employees aim at one goal, becoming you reference of satisfaction.

We use SolidWorks, PDM Works, Autocad and E-Drawings to design our equipments.
